ost_step.1: In this case we know that Harriet is currently aged 21.
ost_step.2: Since Adrian’s age equals 3*Harriets age then his current age would equal 3 * 21= 63.
ost_step.3: And since Zacks age totals double what Harriet ages right now, his present age equates as  2 * 21 = 42 .

direct_answer.text:
First let us calculate their future ages (in three years). We add three to their current ages like so;

For adrian it will become :   63(currently) + 3 -> 66    
for harriet it becomes :     21+3 -> 24      
and zack gets older too ;        42+3-> 45       
Now adding all these up results into ,         66 + 24 + 45 = 135                             
To get the average you divide this sum by number of people which here amounts to 3               =>          135/3 = 45
